attributes.action: Investigate Anjem Choudary for benefit fraud and inciting terrorism in Britain.
attributes.additional_details: Anjem Choudary is often witnessed online bragging that he does not have to work and claims jihad allowance,  he is also online encouraging people to join Islam and often praises the work of islamic terrorists abroad. We the British public believe Anjem Choudary is claiming benefits when he is fit for work and we believe he is inciting terrorism, and terrorist activity in Britain.

rejection.details: This would be an operational policing matter
